collection.heading: Collection
collection.text: Collections are a continuous group of text or images. They are composed of items containing primary and supplemental actions, which are represented by icons and text. This component consists of multiple interacting components (@collection and @collection__item).

simpleCollection.heading: Plain text collection
simpleCollection.text: Just a plain and simple collection. The first item is linked in each list. First collection utilizes the slot, and the second utlizes the array list input method.

multilineCollection.heading: Multiline text collection
multilineCollection.text: Sometimes you just want more in life than single rows.

fullCollection.heading: Collection with secondary
fullCollection.text: Thie is a collection utilizing actions / secondary area.

modifiersCollection.heading: Collection with secondary
modifiersCollection.text: Thie is a collection utilizing actions / secondary area.
